Highlighted Clause: Licenses with respect to audio content, and any images or text within your account, will (subject to the following paragraph of these terms of use) terminate automatically when you remove such content from your account.
Plain Language Summary: Your license over your audio, images, and text content ends automatically if you decide to delete this content from your account.

Highlighted Clause: Licenses with respect to comments or other contributions that you make on the platform will be perpetual and irrevocable, and will continue notwithstanding any termination of your account.
Plain Language Summary: Any comments or contributions you make on the platform will be licensed forever and cannot be taken back, even if your account is terminated.

Highlighted Clause: removal of audio content from your account will automatically result in the deletion of the relevant files from SoundCloud's systems and servers.
Plain Language Summary: If you delete your audio content from your account, it will also be deleted from SoundCloud's servers.

Highlighted Clause: Notwithstanding the foregoing, nothing in these terms of use grants any rights to any other user of the platform with respect to any proprietary name, logo, trademark or service mark uploaded by you as part of your content.
Plain Language Summary: Other users are not granted any rights to your proprietary names, logos, trademarks, or service marks when you upload them as part of your content.

Highlighted Clause: This does not affect our right to transfer our rights or obligations to a third party as described in the assignment to third parties section.
Plain Language Summary: The company can transfer its rights or obligations under these terms to another party despite other stated terms.

Plain Language Summary: Unless required by US law or the law of any EU member state, this agreement is governed by the laws of Germany.

Plain Language Summary: You must use the platform according to these terms and follow the community guidelines.

Plain Language Summary: SoundCloud may introduce new tools, resources, app versions, services, or features at any time.
